question: imam saheb please tell me, can i marriage with my mothers khala's daughter? and what is its sharai mas'ala & anybody will have objection this marriage than what should i tell them? please tell me very about this mas'ala.
answer:
QUESTION

imam saheb please tell me, can i marriage with my mothers khala's daughter? and what is its sharai mas'ala & anybody will have objection this marriage than what should i tell them? please tell me very about this mas'ala.



ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

It is permissible for you to marry your mother’s khala’s daughter. If someone raises objection to your marriage, then you should refer him to a Mufti or Ālim.

 

 (Tafsīr Ibn Kathīr, Vol. 1, Pg.474) [1]

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

 

Ml. Abdur Rahman Shareef,
Student Dārul Iftā

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Dārul Iftā




[1] قال الله تعالى: (وأحل لكم ما وراء ذلكم (النساء 24)

"أى ما عدا من ذكرن من المحارم،هن لكم حلال"(تفسير ابن كثير،سهيل اكيدمى،لا هور)
